columns.name: app_id
columns.desc: A string identifying which game from which the event came

columns.name: app_id_fast
columns.desc: A second version of the app id, to be removed

columns.name: app_version
columns.desc: The version of the game from which the event came

columns.name: session_id
columns.desc: Unique identifier for the gameplay session

columns.name: persistent_session_id
columns.desc: Unique identifier across all gameplay sessions from a single computer

columns.name: player_id
columns.desc: A custom, per-player ID, only exists if player entered an ID on one of our custom portal pages, else null

columns.name: level
columns.desc: The game level in which the event was logged

columns.name: event_custom
columns.desc: A number corresponding to the game-specific event type for events labeled 'Custom'

columns.name: event_data_complex
columns.desc: Data specific to an event type, encoded as a JSON string

columns.name: client_time
columns.desc: The client machine time when the event was generated

columns.name: client_time_ms
columns.desc: Number of milliseconds to append to client time

columns.name: server_time
columns.desc: The server machine time when the event was logged

columns.name: remote_addr
columns.desc: The IP address for the player's computer

columns.name: req_id
columns.desc: Another ID of some kind, to be removed

columns.name: session_n
columns.desc: Counter of events in the session, from 0. A row with session_n = i is the (i+1)-th event of the session

columns.name: http_user_agent
columns.desc: Data on the type of web browser, OS, etc. in use by the player
